# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a default statistics result.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Metal creates [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCounterResultStatistic] instances for you when you resolve the counter set’s data (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/converting-a-gpus-counter-data-into-a-readable-format]). There’s no reason for you to manually create one in your app.

## Swift support

- **init(tessellationInputPatches:vertexInvocations:postTessellationVertexInvocations:clipperInvocations:clipperPrimitivesOut:fragmentInvocations:fragmentsPassed:computeKernelInvocations:)**: Creates a statistics result from statistic values.

items.description: Creates a statistics result from statistic values.
